title: MongoDB vs. Couchbase: Comparing Mobile Database Features
author: Mark Gamble
description: MongoDB is deprecating its Atlas Device Sync and Atlas Device SDKs. Here’s what to know if you’re considering migrating to Couchbase Mobile.
cntitle: MongoDB与Couchbase：移动数据库功能对比
cndescription: MongoDB 即将弃用其 Atlas 设备同步和 Atlas 设备 SDK。如果您正在考虑迁移到 Couchbase Mobile，请了解以下信息。
